Description: FRagment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '376'. Name Kallikrates. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0147.43.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (106)
